title: Royal Challengers Bengaluru vs Punjab Kings, IPL 2025 Final Highlights: Virat Kohli's RCB End 18-Year Wait For Title, Beat PBKS By 6 Runs In Final
description: Royal Challengers Bengaluru vs Punjab Kings Highlights, IPL 2025 Final: RCB finally managed to win an IPL title in their fourth appearance in the final.
excerpt: Royal Challengers Bengaluru vs Punjab Kings Highlights, IPL 2025 Final: RCB finally managed to win an IPL title in their fourth appearance in the final.
text: RCB vs PBKS LIVE: Thank you! IPL 2025 comes to an end. The festival will come again next year. That's a wrap for our coverage. 74 matches, a week's break in between, and at the end, history made by RCB. Thank you for joining us along the way on NDTV Sports.Stay tuned, as we bring you live coverage of the French Open, the Club World Cup, and very soon, India's tour of England!Thank you! Goodnight. RCB vs PBKS LIVE: RCB LIFT IPL 2025 TROPHY! The trophy lift, for Royal Challengers Bengaluru, at long last! Patidar lofts the golden cup high. Virat Kohli is right beside him. Moments of joy and ecstasy for RCB. IPL 2025, historic! This year, they've finally done it!Cup pic.twitter.com/bBwpZvLD9g— Royal Challengers Bengaluru (@RCBTweets) June 3, 2025 RCB vs PBKS LIVE: Here comes RCB to collect the prize! Rajat Patidar steps forward to accept the winning cheque - Rs 20 crore. What a season for RCB, what a moment for Patidar, to win it in his first season as captain. When the mega auction got over, no one would've imagined he'd be the one lifting the cup. RCB vs PBKS LIVE: Punjab Kings collect runners-up medals End of a brilliant season for Punjab Kings. Sure, it may be heartbreak for now. But in Shreyas Iyer as captain, Ricky Ponting as coach, and a superb core of young Indian talent, they have plenty to be excited for in seasons to come. RCB vs PBKS LIVE: IPL 2025 Awards List Orange Cap: B Sai SudharsanPurple Cap: Prasidh KrishnaEmerging Player: B Sai SudharsanSuper Striker: Vaibhav SuryavanshiCatch of the Season: Kamindu MendisFairplay Award: Chennai Super KingsMost Valuable Player: Suryakumar Yadav RCB vs PBKS LIVE: Krunal Pandya wins POTM Krunal Pandya is awarded the 'Player of the Match' award. A superb spell of 2/17 in 4 overs. Excellent spell from the experienced all-rounder on the day it matters the most. Huge performance by him. IPL Final LIVE: The presentation starts! The post-match presentation ceremony has started. In a matter of moments, we will see RCB captain Rajat Patidar speak. We will also see the RCB team burst into celebration with the cup! RCB vs PBKS LIVE: Kohli, Gayle, ABD say 'Ee Saala Cup Namdu' This is gold. Virat Kohli is being interviewed alongside AB de Villiers and Chris Gayle. Kohli points out that the phrase is now 'Ee Saala Cup Namdu'. Hugs and laughter among the holy trinity of RCB. Incredible scenes. RCB vs PBKS LIVE: A long way to go for PBKS Punjab Kings have plenty to be proud of. A team that fields as many as six uncapped Indians in their playing XI. Don't be surprised if at least half of them are capped by the time IPL 2026 comes around. Priyansh Arya, Prabhsimran Singh, Nehal Wadhera, Vijaykumar Vyshak, Harpreet Brar. A team full of bubbling Indian talent!They'll have a lot more to achieve. RCB vs PBKS LIVE: Captain Rajat Patidar! Not only Virat Kohli, but Rajat Patidar also etches his name into RCB folklore. The shock captaincy choice ahead of the season, he'll be the first captain for this historic franchise to lift the cup. A massive achievement for Patidar. RCB vs PBKS LIVE: Long embrace between Virat and Anushka Virat Kohli and wife Anushka Sharma share a long, warm embrace. Emotional moments for him. The players are circling the trophy now. They've earned this moment. A gruelling season of IPL, but after 7/7 away wins, they won Q1 and won the Final. RCB vs PBKS LIVE: EE SAALA CUP NAMDU! One year after the women did it, the men have done it too. Royal Challengers Bengaluru, arguably the most popular franchise, can finally go back and look at the IPL trophy in their cabinet. A long, long wait, but now, an emotional release. 'Ee Saala Cup Namde' finally becomes 'Ee Saala Cup Namdu'. RCB vs PBKS LIVE: It's right up there, says Kohli Virat Kohli has won a World Cup, two Champions Trophies, one T20 World Cup, been the Player of the Tournament at a World Cup, won the IPL Orange Cap twice. But even he says that this trophy ranks right up there."It feels more special to do this with RCB, after 18 years. I'll stay with this franchise till the last day I play in the IPL." RCB vs PBKS LIVE: KOHLI'S FIRST REACTION! Virat Kohli, full of emotion, having cried his heart out with joy, speaks on RCB's title win: "I tried to win this every season, come and give everything I have. I never thought this day would come. I was overcome with emotion to finally win the IPL!" IPL 2025 Final LIVE: Kudos to RCB management Andy Flower, Dinesh Karthik, Mo Bobat. The men who sat at the auction table and picked this core of players at the IPL 2025 mega auction. And they can look back and feel proud of it.  RCB vs PBKS LIVE: ABD, Gayle celebrate AB de Villiers was earlier on the pitch capturing the moment. Now Chris Gayle is there too. Two of RCB's greatest players who never got to taste IPL success. But they're here to celebrate now. Fourth time lucky for RCB! RCB vs PBKS LIVE: Take a bow, Krunal Pandya A fourth IPL title for Krunal Pandya. 2017, 2019, 2020 with MI. 2025 with RCB. And what a role he played. 17 wickets in 15 matches, a match-winning knock with the bat too. Probably the best all-rounder of IPL 2025 too. RCB vs PBKS LIVE: Commiserations Punjab Kings Punjab Kings would've fancied themselves to chase 191 down, but some excellent middle overs, led by Krunal Pandya's miserly spell, made the difference. You have to feel for PBKS, so close, yet so far in the end. Second IPL final in 18 years, but it ends in defeat too. A terrific season, they topped the table, but just couldn't get over the line. RCB vs PBKS LIVE: Virat Kohli's crowning moment Finally. Virat Kohli wins the IPL title. 18 years with one franchise, two Orange Caps, but look at the emotions on his face. In tears, in ecstasy. RCB have finally done it, and AB de Villiers is on the ground to capture the raw emotions.  RCB vs PBKS LIVE: RCB WIN IPL 2025! Royal Challengers Bengaluru are IPL 2025 CHAMPIONS! Shashank Singh slams the last ball for 6 but it will not matter! Virat Kohli is in tears, Swastik Chikara is there to embrace him. RCB captain Rajat Patidar has run away in celebration. The team are cheering in joy. The 18-year wait ends at long last!RCB 190/8 (20) beat PBKS 184/7 (20) by 6 runs! RCB vs PBKS LIVE: SIX, FOUR, SIX Shashank Three big hits from Shashank Singh, but these boundaries won't make an impact. First a shot over deep square-leg, then a boundary over the keeper's head. The third one is smashed over mid-wicket. You have to feel for PBKS as well, they'll lose their second IPL final.PBKS 178/7 (19.5) RCB vs PBKS LIVE: RCB seal it? Two dots in a row! Punjab Kings now need 29 runs in 4 balls. It is mathematically impossible for them, if RCB bowl 4 legal balls. Virat Kohli looks filled with emotion, on the verge of tears. A crowd full of RCB fans are cheering.PBKS 162/7 (19.2) IPL 2025 Final LIVE: PBKS need 29 off 6 One 6, one 4, but this won't bother RCB. Punjab Kings need 29 runs off the final over. Shashank Singh on strike, Hazlewood to bowl.PBKS 162/7 (19) RCB vs PBKS LIVE: PBKS need 41 off 12 Excellent over by Yash Dayal. Just 6 runs off the 18th over. Shashank and Jamieson need to score more than 20 runs per over for the final two. A mountain to climb.PBKS 149/7 (18) RCB vs PBKS LIVE: OUT! GONE! Omarzai departs, Punjab Kings are 7-down now! Yash Dayal takes the wicket with his second ball. Omarzai goes for a big slog, catches the ball on the toe end of the bat and it is caught by sub fielder Manoj Bhandage.PBKS 145/7 (17.2) IPL Final LIVE: PBKS need 47 off 18 vs RCB 3 overs to go. 47 runs needed. 16 runs per over. Shashank Singh and Azmatullah Omarzai at the crease. These are two players who can still strike a long ball. Punjab Kings aren't out of it just yet, but RCB can dream.PBKS 144/6 (17) RCB vs PBKS LIVE: OUT! Massive wicket! Marcus Stoinis is gone! The Australian departs second-ball. Huge, huge, huge wicket. Is that Punjab Kings' last hope gone? RCB can feel it, RCB can dare to dream about the first IPL title. Bhuvi has delivered two wickets in one over. Stoinis swings, thick outside edge flies to Yash Dayal at short third.PBKS 142/6 (16.4) RCB vs PBKS LIVE: Stoinis starts with 6! BANG! Marcus Stoinis comes to the crease and deposits the first ball he faces over covers for a maximum. This game is far from over, and Stoinis has sent the warning to RCB! He needs to stay till the end for PBKS to win.PBKS 142/5 (16.3) RCB vs PBKS LIVE: OUT! Bhuvneshwar gets Wadhera! Big wicket for RCB, another dismissal. Good wide yorker by Bhuvneshwar Kumar, Wadhera goes for the big shot but ends up slicing it to Krunal Pandya at deep extra cover.PBKS 136/5 (16.2) RCB vs PBKS LIVE: RCB waste DRS review Another poor DRS review by RCB, after an appeal for LBW against Shashank. Clearly missing the stumps. They have no more reviews left. Meanwhile, Shashank ends the Hazlewood over with another six! Smashed over long-on. 17 off the over. PBKS need 55 off the last 4!PBKS 136/4 (16) RCB vs PBKS LIVE: SIX! Short ball, whacked for a maximum! Slower ball by Hazlewood, helped away for a maximum by Shashank Singh. Excellent shot. 8 runs in the first 3 balls of the over. PBKS staying alive in this run chase.PBKS 127/4 (15.3) RCB vs PBKS LIVE: 13 off the over Still not what they need! A boundary, a six but the required rate keeps climbing. 13 runs in the over, they need over 14! Good comeback by Shepherd, concedes just 2 runs in the final 3 deliveries of the over. PBKS need 72 in 5 overs.PBKS 119/4 (15) RCB vs PBKS LIVE: SIX! Wadhera! Sweet sound off the bat! That is a cracking shot from the young left-hander. Smashed over mid-wicket, all the way for 6. Two uncapped Indian batters at the crease, and is this the over that the comeback begins?PBKS 118/4 (14.4) IPL 2025 Final LIVE: FOUR! Romario Shepherd back, and Shashank slams it down the ground for 4. First boundary in more than 12 overs. Meanwhile, RCB have been given their second warning for not starting an over in 60 seconds. One more warning, and they'll be handed a 5-run penalty!PBKS 111/4 (14.2) RCB vs PBKS LIVE: Good over by Suyash Just 5 runs off the 14th over. Wadhera and Shashank really struggling. Both going at a strike rate of 50. Shashank 3 off 6, Wadhera 6 off 12. Punjab Kings need 85 runs in the final 6 overs. Required run rate over 14!PBKS 106/4 (14) RCB vs PBKS LIVE: Title-winning spell by Krunal Pandya? 4 overs, 2/17. Scintillating spell by Krunal Pandya in the IPL final. Possibly the spell that could win RCB their long-awaited trophy. Bringing all his experience into the game, and putting on a superb showing. Superb stuff.PBKS need 90 runs in 42 balls. Required rate: 12.86PBKS 101/4 (13) RCB vs PBKS LIVE: HUGE WICKET! Josh Inglis departs! The set batter is gone! Krunal Pandya gets his second wicket, there's pandemonium among the RCB team. Josh Inglis is caught at long-on, he departs for 39 off 23 balls. 93 runs needed off 47 balls now.PBKS 98/4 (12.1) RCB vs PBKS LIVE: SIX, Inglis! Josh Inglis is keeping Punjab Kings in this run chase! Short ball by Shepherd and a fabulous shot by Inglis over mid-wicket. 10 runs come off Shepherd's second over. Punjab Kings still need to score at over 11 runs per over.PBKS 98/3 (12) RCB vs PBKS LIVE: Another top over by Krunal Krunal Pandya is a man on a mission today. Excellent over by Krunal, who is going at less than 5 runs an over in the IPL final. After conceding a six on the first ball, he comes back by bowling 4 dots in the next 5 balls.PBKS 88/3 (11) RCB vs PBKS LIVE: SIX! Josh Inglis continues the merry! He hits spin so well. The Australian will need to play a big knock today if RCB are to win today. Once again, smashes a maximum over mid-wicket. Into the 30s now.PBKS 87/3 (10.2) RCB vs PBKS LIVE: PBKS need 110 in 10 overs 11 runs per over. That's the equation for Punjab Kings to win the IPL 2025 final. Humongous wicket of Shreyas Iyer, who has been silenced in the final. Romario Shepherd with the huge wicket. Onus now on Inglis and Wadhera.PBKS 81/3 (10)(Live Scorecard) RCB vs PBKS LIVE: HUGE WICKET! IYER DEPARTS! SHREYAS IYER IS GONE! Caught behind! Romario Shepherd takes the wicket, Jitesh Sharma with the catch. RCB players celebrating, Virat Kohli is charged up and the first one to high-five Shepherd. Huge, huge wicket.PBKS 79/3 (9.4) RCB vs PBKS LIVE: FOUR! Slammed! Through mid-wicket, one bounce for 4. Romario Shepherd into the attack, bowls a cutter, but helped through to the fence by Inglis. The Australian continues to look in good touch today. PBKS 78/2 (9.2) RCB vs PBKS LIVE: Krunal continues great spell First over: 3 runs. Second over: 4 runs and 1 wicket. Krunal Pandya has bowled really well in the IPL 2025 final. He's kept RCB in the hunt here, and PBKS' required rate is over 10 at the moment. Tricky chase from here, but they've got the perfect man at the crease.PBKS 74/2 (9) RCB vs PBKS LIVE: OUT! Big wicket! Krunal Pandya strikes. Prabhsimran Singh is gone. Comes down the track, looks to go for the big shot, but falls trying. Bhuvneshwar Kumar takes the catch. Prabhsimran departs for 27. Shreyas Iyer the next man in.PBKS 72/2 (8.3) RCB vs PBKS LIVE: SIX! Prabhsimran, 6! Clean hit from the uncapped batter. Gives himself room and slams it back over Suyash's head for a maximum. Two sixes against the bowler who was 'Player of the Match' against you in the previous over is a bold tactic! 15 off the over.PBKS 70/1 (8) RCB vs PBKS LIVE: SIX! Josh Inglis, maximum! Excellent shot by the Australian. Sits deep into his crease, and whacks a 6 over mid-wicket. Kohli tries to take it, but no chance. Suyash Sharma into the attack, he made a big difference in Qualifier 1. Inglis targetting him off the bat.PBKS 62/1 (7.2) RCB vs PBKS LIVE: Great over by Krunal Krunal Pandya handed the ball after the powerplay and he bowls an excellent first over. Concedes just 3 runs. Prabhsimran struggling a little here, 17 off 16. The required run-rate edging towards 11 for Punjab Kings.PBKS 55/1 (7) RCB vs PBKS LIVE: RCB waste review, next ball 6! RCB look desperate for a wicket. Take a review for caught behind against Josh Inglis. Clear not out signalled by the umpire, and UltraEdge confirms just as much. Next ball, Inglis whacks it over mid-wicket for a maximum. 50 up for PBKS.PBKS 52/1 (6) IPL 2025 Final LIVE: STUNNING CATCH BY PHIL SALT! What a catch! Phil Salt with a terrific catch! Priyansh Arya is gone. Flicked pick-up shot, Phil Salt running at deep square-leg, first takes it, throws it back up as he was losing balance, and then comes back and completes the catch. Brilliant take. Virat Kohli is charged up, he is pumped!RCB 43/1 (5) RCB vs PBKS LIVE: Mishits going for 4! Mishit goes for 4! Hazlewood with a sharp bouncer, Priyansh swings, thick edge and it goes over short-third man for 4. Next ball, it's a carbon copy! Near-identical, same ball, same shot, same result through the same era. PBKS 41/0 (4.3) RCB vs PBKS LIVE: Run out at non-striker's end? Priyansh Arya hits it straight back, and Bhuvneshwar seemingly gets a fingertip before the ball crashes into the stumps at the non-striker's end. But Prabhsimran's bat is inside and grounded. PBKS run-rate has slightly fallen.PBKS 32/0 (3.5) RCB vs PBKS LIVE: DROPPED! Prabhsimran put down! Josh Hazlewood creates the chance, Prabhsimran doesn't get everything on the pull shot, but Shepherd has put it down at fine-leg. That should've been taken. These aren't chances you leave defending 190 in an IPL final. (Live Scorecard) PBKS 26/0 (2.4) RCB vs PBKS LIVE: Edged, 4! The young Indian openers dealing in boundaries! Priyansh Arya slams 4, it goes over short-third and into the fence. Priyansh gets another 4 on the final ball of the over. Loose ball by Dayal and flicked towards fine-leg again.All PBKS boundaries coming behind the wicket for now.PBKS 23/0 (2) RCB vs PBKS LIVE: SIX! Prabhsimran ends the first over with a six! The Impact Player brings up the first maximum of the innings. Short ball by Bhuvneshwar, aimed towards third-man, Phil Salt with a big jump at the boundary but can't take it. (Live Scorecard) PBKS 13/0 (1) RCB vs PBKS LIVE: Just short! Falls slightly short! Priyansh clips it towards mid-off but the ball lands short of Josh Hazlewood. Bhuvi had taken the pace off. Almost got him. Bhuvneshwar coming back well after conceding a boundary on the first ball.PBKS: 6/0 (0.4) RCB vs PBKS LIVE: First ball 4! Bhuvi with a poor ball and flicked away for a boundary on the very first ball by Priyansh Arya, down fine-leg. Off the mark with 4. Tighter ball by Bhuvneshwar right after that, and Priyansh takes a single.PBKS 5/0 (0.2) RCB vs PBKS LIVE: Here come the openers! The run chase is set to begin! Prabhsimran Singh comes on as the Impact Player, replacing Chahal. Priyansh Arya is at the other end. PBKS's young, uncapped Indian opening pair have done wonders this season, can they repeat it?Bhuvneshwar Kumar takes the new ball. IPL 2025 Final LIVE: RCB "15-20 runs short" Former UK Prime Minister Rishi Sunak speaks to the broadcaster in the mid-innings break. He's supporting RCB, having been married into a Bengaluru family, but admits that RCB may be 15 runs short. RCB legend AB de Villiers echoes Sunak's statements too. RCB vs PBKS LIVE: Par score for RCB? 190 is a decent total. Virat Kohli top-scoring with 44 for Royal Challengers Bengaluru, but he never got going smoothly. Good cameos by Salt, Mayank, Patidar, Jitesh and Livingstone. But they'll need their experienced pacers Hazlewood, Bhuvneshwar and Dayal to deliver some early wickets. RCB vs PBKS LIVE: PBKS need 191 to win IPL 2025 title Game in the balance? Punjab Kings have done a good job with the ball, and held RCB back every time they tried to break loose. Kyle Jamieson took 3 wickets, Vyshak, Omarzai and Chahal bowled well, and Arshdeep took 3 wickets in the last over!Punjab Kings need 191 runs to win the IPL for the first time ever! IPL 2025 Final LIVE: RCB end on 190 What a final over by Arshdeep Singh! 3 runs, 3 wickets! 1, W, 1, W, 1, W. Absolutely incredible from the left-arm pacer. Priyansh Arya takes the catch on the final ball, Bhuvneshwar Kumar departs. RCB end on 190/8!RCB 190/8 (20 overs)PBKS Target: 191 RCB vs PBKS LIVE: OUT! Krunal departs! Arshdeep with 2 in 1 over. Krunal goes for the big hit, but finds Shreyas Iyer at long-on. 2 runs, 2 wickets in 4 balls so far in the final over. RCB are going to miss out on 200 at this rate.RCB 189/8 (19.4) RCB vs PBKS LIVE: Arshdeep gets Shepherd! OUT! Excellent yorker! Arshdeep with a brilliant delivery, misses it, and it crashes into the stumps. Fine start to the final over by Arshdeep, and the dangerous Shepherd is gone before he could hit more. He takes the DRS review, but this is as plumb as it can get.RCB 188/7 (19.2) RCB vs PBKS LIVE: FOUR! SIX! 4, 6! Shepherd swings hard and gets a boundary! Four singles in a row, Shepherd swings hard again, and gets a boundary over fine-leg. Next ball, disappears into the stands! 6 runs, what a hit. Important boundaries from Romario Shepherd. This one over long-on!RCB 187/6 (19)(Live Scorecard) RCB vs PBKS LIVE: 2 overs to go An excellent final over by Vyshak. Just 5 runs from the over. 1/30 in 4 overs for Vyshak, what a spell in the final. Be it the powerplay, middle overs or death, he has bowled an excellent spell tonight. Onus on Romario Shepherd now.RCB 173/6 (18) RCB vs PBKS LIVE: OUT! Bowled! Vyshak finally gets his wicket! Two chances didn't work out, but Vyshak gets Jitesh on the fourth ball of the over. Jitesh goes for the shot, chops it onto his stumps. What an excellent 18th over this is turning out to be. Vyshak prepares an aggressive celebration but then holds back.RCB 171/6 (17.4) RCB vs PBKS LIVE: Jitesh out? Appeal for caught behind and Jitesh is given out by the umpire! He takes the DRS review in the blink of an eye. The ball has passed close to the bat, but there is no edge! Jitesh survives, and a big roar from the RCB fans in Ahmedabad.RCB 171/5 (17.3) RCB vs PBKS LIVE: DROPPED! Romario Shepherd has been put down! Goes for the big shot against Vyshak, mistimes it, diving effort from substitute fielder Praveen Dubey but he has put it down. How costly will that be for PBKS?RCB 171/5 (17.2) RCB vs PBKS LIVE: 23 off the over, but a wicket 23 runs off Kyle Jamieson's final over. He ends with figures of 3/48 in 4 overs. Took the wickets of Salt, Patidar and Livingstone. Jitesh and Romario are proven finishers, and they're in charge of taking RCB past 200 now.RCB 168/5 (17) RCB vs PBKS LIVE: OUT! Jamieson gets Livingstone! The Englishman tries to go for a big swing, but it's a slow full toss from Jamieson, and he ends up missing it. Umpire raises the finger straight away. Livingstone has gone up with a review. And it's umpire's call! Livingstone departsRCB 167/4 (16.5) RCB vs PBKS LIVE: Now Livingstone, 6! Liam Livingstone hammers Jamieson for 6! Third maximum of the over! RCB are finally breaking loose. Livingstone has had a poor season, but he's chosen the perfect game to make a solid contribution. Thunderous strike over mid-wicket.RCB 166/4 (16.4) RCB vs PBKS LIVE: SIX MORE! Jitesh Sharma is going berserk! Another maximum! Thrashes it for 6 more against Kyle Jamieson. Gives himself room, and smashes it over long-off for 6. 24 runs off 8 balls, some batting from Jitesh.RCB 159/4 (16.3) RCB vs PBKS LIVE: SIX, Jitesh! Jitesh Sharma, incredible! What a shot. Scoop, 6! But it's a bouncer from Jamieson, so it is some shot by Jitesh to get it over the keeper's head for a maximum. What a run of form Jitesh is in. "RCB, RCB" chants rings around the Narendra Modi Stadium now.RCB 152/4 (16.1) IPL 2025 Final LIVE: RCB run-rate above 9 Four overs to go, RCB's run-rate has finally climbed back above 9. They need 55 runs in the final 4 overs to get to a total of 200. Livingstone has hit a maximum, Jitesh has hit a couple of boundaries. Can RCB tee off from here?RCB 145/4 (16) RCB vs PBKS LIVE: 4, 4 Jitesh! RCB's wicket-keeper batter is dealing in boundaries! Onus on Jitesh now, who played a superhuman 33-ball 85 to take RCB into the top two. First a boundary through the on-side, and then slapped through extra cover for 4.RCB 142/4 (15.4) IPL 2025 Final LIVE: 5 overs to go Liam Livingstone and Jitesh Sharma at the crease for RCB, with 5 overs to go. Up to the finishers now to take them to a total they can defend. Romario Shepherd and Krunal Pandya still to come as well, they can hit it long too. (Live Scorecard)  RCB vs PBKS LIVE: KOHLI OUT! VIRAT KOHLI GONE! That's a huge, huge wicket for Punjab Kings! Virat Kohli will not score a half-century in the IPL 2025 final. Kohli mistimes Omarzai's bouncer, sends it high up in the air, and the Afghan himself collects a good diving catch. Kohli out for 43 off 35 balls. Massive wicket.RCB 131/4 (14.5) RCB vs PBKS LIVE: Expensive last over for Chahal Chahal ends with a 14-run final over. He had bowled three really good overs to start, and took the wicket of Mayank Agarwal. But that over will help RCB's run-rate a lot, and perhaps set them off towards a 200 total.RCB 125/3 (14) RCB vs PBKS LIVE: 4, Kohli! Hammered by Kohli for 4! RCB now going after the bowling. Thrashes it through mid-wicket, between two fielders. Excellent placement by Kohli, who is nearing an IPL record 9th half-century in a single season.RCB 123/3 (13.4) IPL 2025 Final LIVE: SIX! SIX! Liam Livingstone goes after Chahal, in what is the final over of the leggie. Comes down the track and smashes it over long-off for a maximum. Excellent, calculated hit by the Englishman. Seems to be a clear discussion at the timeout.RCB 117/3 (13.1) RCB vs PBKS LIVE: Vyshak bowling well Virat Kohli and Liam Livingstone under pressure here. Not going great guns at the moment. Livingstone a run-a-ball 6. Kohli on 35 runs off 29 balls. Vyshak has bowled well, bowled economically. PBKS slightly ahead at this point, it must be said.RCB 111/3 (13) RCB vs PBKS LIVE: Excellent over by Chahal Another superb over by Yuzvendra Chahal. Injury doubts over him before the match, but he has chipped in with an excellent performance so far. 1/23 in 3 overs so far. Onus now on Virat Kohli, completely. 26-ball 32, he's settled, and needs to up the scoring rate. 100 up for RCB.RCB 103/2 (12) RCB vs PBKS LIVE: OUT! PATIDAR GONE! Jamieson with his second wicket of the evening. And once again, Punjab Kings strike just when a batter is starting to get a move-on. RCB's captain is gone in the final. Excellent full delivery, Patidar misses and it smashes him on the pads. That's plumb. (Live Scorecard)RCB 97/3 (11) RCB vs PBKS LIVE: SIX MORE! Rajat Patidar on song! Slams it over long-off for six. Excellent shot by the RCB captain, first time he's crossed 20 in a long while. Looking really good at the moment, and scoring the bulk of runs at the moment.RCB 96/2 (10.3) RCB vs PBKS LIVE: FOUR! 4 runs, Kohli! Short from Omarzai and Kohli comes up with an upper cut, over the keeper's head. Second boundary of the evening for Kohli, and his first in 17 balls. 27 off 21 now Kohli, only 7 comes off the 10th over too.RCB 87/2 (10) IPL Final LIVE: Edge for PBKS? Punjab Kings have kept a good check of the RCB run-rate. Most importantly, they've taken wickets whenever the batters have looked to get a move-on. Shreyas Iyer has been good with his bowling changes so far.RCB 80/2 (9) RCB vs PBKS LIVE: RCB still going at under 9 rpo Rajat Patidar with a maximum, but Kohli is still taking his time out in the middle. The 36-year-old is holding one end tight. 11 runs off Yuzi Chahal's second over. RCB going at just under 9 runs per over. RCB 80/2 (9) RCB vs PBKS LIVE: SIX! Patidar goes big! The RCB captain has been lacking in runs of late, but he takes the attack to Chahal and gets 6 runs over long-on. Excellent shot from Patidar. He swings hard on the next ball, but is denied a boundary in the deep.RCB 78/2 (8.4) RCB vs PBKS LIVE: Great over by Chahal Yuzvendra Chahal with a top class first over. He concedes just 6 runs, and breaks the partnership. Punjab Kings have pulled the RCB run-rate below 9, and are taking wickets at regular intervals. Good start to them in the final.RCB 61/2 (7) RCB vs PBKS LIVE: OUT! Chahal strikes! OUT! Mayank Agarwal is gone! Yuzvendra Chahal strikes with his second ball! Iyer with the decision to hand Chahal the ball after the powerplay has worked. Agarwal looks to help it over square-leg, seemingly in two minds, but finds Arshdeep Singh in the deep.RCB 56/2 (6.2) RCB vs PBKS LIVE: 55 in powerplay A hotly-contested powerplay here. RCB going at just over 9 runs an over. They got a fast start from Phil Salt, but Kyle Jamieson took the big wicket in the second over of the match. Decent start by Kohli and Agarwal, but nothing breathtaking yet.RCB 55/1 (6) IPL 2025 Final LIVE: Chance, but 4! 50 up for RCB Mayank Agarwal sends it very high into the air, Arshdeep Singh gives chase but fails to hold on and it goes for 4. Arshdeep crashes into the boundary barriers, but he seems to be fine. 50 up for RCB in 5.4 overs.RCB 53/1 (5.4) RCB vs PBKS LIVE: Good first over by Omarzai Azamtullah Omarzai comes into the bowling attack, first change. Bowls a tidy over, does not concede a single boundary. 7 runs come off the over, Agarwal and Kohli settling in. Good bowling by the Afghan all-rounder. Vyshak to bowl from the other end.RCB 46/1 (5) RCB vs PBKS LIVE: 3 dots to end Once again, Jamieson comes back well after being hit for a boundary. Ends the over with three dots in a row. Good start by RCB, but PBKS will be happy so far that they have got the wicket of the dangerous Phil Salt.RCB 39/1 (4) RCB vs PBKS LIVE: 4, Mayank! Another classy shot by Mayank Agarwal! Shorter by Jamieson and a brilliant square-cut from Mayank to guide it for 4 through point. Gets a charged-up fist bump from Kohli after that shot. RCB going well in the powerplay.RCB 39/1 (3.3) IPL 2025 Final LIVE: FOUR, Kohli! First boundary for Virat Kohli in the IPL 2025 final! Full, on the pads, and flicked away towards fine-leg for 4 by Kohli. Hasn't faced many balls in the first two overs, let's see how he controls the tempo now.RCB 34/1 (3.1) RCB vs PBKS LIVE: SIX! Mayank Agarwal to the party! It was turning out to be a good over from Arshdeep, but Mayank cashes in on the final ball of the over. Excellent shot, over mid-off, maximum. Great shot for 6. 11 off the over.RCB 30/1 (3) RCB vs PBKS LIVE: Great over by Jamieson Superb over by Jamieson. Two brilliant balls to Mayank Agarwal, the new batter. Mayank gets a thick edge and is lucky to not be caught by the wicket-keeper or first slip. Just 6 runs from the over, and the big wicket of Salt.RCB 19/1 (2) IPL 2025 Final LIVE: Salt gone! BIG WICKET! Phil Salt is gone! Punjab Kings strike back. Jamieson with a slower ball, Phil Salt goes for the big shot but ends up skying it. Shreyas Iyer is the man at mid-on, but it's a cool, calm, composed catch by the PBKS skipper! And he is pumped.RCB 18/1 (1.4) RCB vs PBKS LIVE: Kohli off the mark, but Salt going berserk Kyle Jamieson opens the bowling from the other end. Virat Kohli gets off the mark with a jab down to backward point. But here goes Phil Salt again! Slams it over the 30-yard circle, over mid-on and gets 4! Flying start by the Englishman.RCB 18/0 (1.2) RCB vs PBKS LIVE: FOUR! Now, a boundary! Same region, fine-leg. Short again by Arshdeep, and Salt once again rocks back and helps it back behind. Clear tactic from Arshdeep, but Salt is up to the task. Great first over for RCB, 13 off it.RCB 13/0 (1) RCB vs PBKS LIVE: SIX! First maximum of the IPL 2025 final! Phil Salt with the big hit, slammed over fine-leg. Short ball by Arshdeep and helped on its way by the fiery English opener. He's been in good form heading into the final. Takes a couple of runs on the next ball.RCB 9/0 (0.4) RCB vs PBKS LIVE: IPL final starts with a wide! The IPL 2025 final starts with a wide down the leg-side. Arshdeep Singh swinging it away from Phil Salt, and Inglis has to put in a good dive to save it going away. Next ball, he swings the other way. Arshdeep has got Salt out 4 times in 2025!RCB 1/0 (0.1) RCB vs PBKS LIVE: Here come the players! Virat Kohli and Phil Salt are out to open for RCB. Huge, huge fanfare for RCB tonight, and nothing will get them going more than their iconic talisman playing a big final knock. Kohli is one half-century away from scoring the most fifties in a single IPL season by a batter.Arshdeep Singh with the new ball! RCB vs PBKS LIVE: The national anthem being played The national anthem is being played ahead of the match at the Narendra Modi Stadium. The players are out at the pitch. We are moments away from the start of the IPL 2025 FINAL! RCB vs PBKS LIVE: THE BIG FINAL IPL 2025 Final LIVE: Ravi Shastri's hilarious slip-up RCB vs PBKS LIVE: Close up on PBKS XI Punjab Kings have had a consistent lineup for their entire season, and it is no different for the final. Four frontline pacers, all-round options, as well as the spin guile of Chahal.Can't wait to get it started! pic.twitter.com/cIheGo08Al— Punjab Kings (@PunjabKingsIPL) June 3, 2025 RCB vs PBKS LIVE: Full look at the RCB XI Take a closer look at the RCB playing XI. Surely no doubt that Suyash Sharma will come on as the Impact Sub, given his 'Player of the Match' performance in Qualifier 1 against the same opponent.For the first time in the history of IPL, we will be batting first in a final. You know what they say about big pressure knock out games, right! Team news for the final showdown: We're going in unchanged! Let's bring it home, boys! #PlayBold #RCB #IPL2025... pic.twitter.com/ZbjaIsxsWj— Royal Challengers Bengaluru (@RCBTweets) June 3, 2025 IPL 2025 Final LIVE: What Rajat Patidar said Rajat Patidar has said that RCB are treating this match like just another game: "Till now we've played good cricket. It's just another game for us. It's a big stage but as I said it's just another away game for us." IPL 2025 Final LIVE: What Shreyas Iyer said Shreyas Iyer said that Punjab Kings players have kept their nerves intact, despite this being the franchise's first final in 11 years: "The boys are in brilliant shape and mindset. All we spoke about in the team meeting is the more calm you are, the better. Nerves are fine. I won't say it's just like another game. It's the final and we're going to play like a final. Tremendous feeling just thinking about lifting the trophy." RCB vs PBKS LIVE: PBKS Playing XI Punjab Kings XI vs RCB: Priyansh Arya, Josh Inglis (wk), Shreyas Iyer (c), Nehal Wadhera, Shashank Singh, Marcus Stoinis, Azmatullah Omarzai, Arshdeep Singh, Kyle Jamieson, Vijaykumar Vyshak, Yuzvendra Chahal.Same team for PBKS. Prabhsimran Singh to be the Impact Player. RCB vs PBKS LIVE: RCB Playing XI Royal Challengers Bengaluru XI vs PBKS: Philip Salt, Virat Kohli, Mayank Agarawal, Rajat Patidar (c), Liam Livingstone, Jitesh Sharma (wk), Romario Shepherd, Krunal Pandya, Bhuvneshwar Kumar, Yash Dayal, Josh Hazlewood.No Tim David for RCB, so Livingstone continues. Expect Suyash Sharma to be the Impact Player. RCB vs PBKS LIVE: Same team for PBKS! Yuzvendra Chahal is fit to play! Shreyas Iyer confirms that PBKS are full strength and are going with the same playing XI. Meanwhile, RCB captain Rajat Patidar also says that he was looking to bowl first. Tricky situation for RCB. RCB vs PBKS LIVE: PBKS WIN TOSS! Punjab Kings captain Shreyas Iyer wins the toss! And he has opted to bowl! Big decision made by the PBKS captain. Remember, some rain is on the cards too on the weather forecast, so that must have been on his mind.Iyer gunning for back-to-back IPL titles. RCB vs PBKS LIVE: IPL final toss time! Toss time at the Narendra Modi Stadium, Ahmedabad! The IPL 2025 final toss time is upon us. Shreyas Iyer leading PBKS, Rajat Patidar is the captain of RCB. A huge roar by the crowd, with Ravi Shastri on the mic. RCB vs PBKS LIVE: Virat Kohli giving pep talk Visuals from the broadcaster shows Virat Kohli and Dinesh Karthik giving a pep talk. How motivated must Kohli be? At the age of 36, this is will be his fourth chance to get his hands on the coveted IPL trophy. He seemed charged up during the pep talk. RCB vs PBKS LIVE: Closing ceremony ends The closing ceremony is done! We are just gearing up for the toss now. Just to remind you what is at stake, two teams who have never won the IPL trophy are gunning for glory. Rajat Patidar leading RCB, Shreyas Iyer the captain of PBKS. IPL 2025 Final LIVE: 15 minutes to toss We are just 15 minutes away from toss time in Ahmedabad. There are clear skies all over the Narendra Modi Stadium in Ahmedabad, with a glimpse of the setting sun as well. Soon, we will see Rajat Patidar and Shreyas Iyer walk out for the most important toss of IPL 2025! RCB vs PBKS LIVE: PBKS predicted XI Here's Punjab Kings' probable XII vs RCB: Priyansh Arya, Prabhsimran Singh, Josh Inglis (wk), Shreyas Iyer (c), Nehal Wadhera, Shashank Singh, Marcus Stoinis, Azmatullah Omarzai, Arshdeep Singh, Kyle Jamieson, Vijaykumar Vyshak, Yuzvendra Chahal.Question marks exist over Chahal's fitness, meaning Harpreet Brar is also in contention. RCB vs PBKS LIVE: RCB predicted XI Here's Royal Challengers Bengaluru's probable XII vs PBKS: Phil Salt, Virat Kohli, Mayank Agarwal, Rajat Patidar (c), Liam Livingstone, Jitesh Sharma (wk), Romario Shepherd, Krunal Pandya, Bhuvneshwar Kumar, Josh Hazlewood, Yash Dayal, Suyash Sharma.Tim David may replace Livingstone if fit. RCB vs PBKS LIVE: Shankar Mahadevan in the house! Popular music composer Shankar Mahadevan is here to mesmerise the crowd. He is currently leading a chorus as we celebrate the success of 'Operation Sindoor'.  SHANKAR MAHADEVAN & TEAM PAYS TRIBUTE TO INDIAN ARMED FORCES.pic.twitter.com/8PQLpuYZEc— Tanuj (@ImTanujSingh) June 3, 2025 RCB vs PBKS LIVE: Weather update With the closing ceremony underway, no prizes for guessing that the skies are clear in Ahmedabad. We are 40 minutes away from toss time, which is set to go on as per schedule, at 7 PM IST.  IPL 2025 Final LIVE: Closing ceremony starts! The closing ceremony for IPL 2025 is starting! Shankar Mahadevan and B Praak are the big attraction today in Ahmedabad. As reported by us earlier, the ceremony is live and underway at 6:15 PM. We are set to have a show of song and dance now!We will first have a dance in tribute of Operation Sindoor and the soldiers who protect the nation every day. RCB vs PBKS LIVE: Weather update! Good news! The rain seems to have stopped at the Narendra Modi Stadium in Ahmedabad. NDTV has learnt that a pitch report is taking place now. If conditions stay like this, toss will go ahead as scheduled. Let's hope the rain gods stay away! RCB vs PBKS LIVE: Shreyas to join Dhoni, Rohit? If Shreyas Iyer wins the title today with Punjab Kings, he will become only the third captain in history to win back-to-back IPL titles. MS Dhoni did it with CSK in 2010 and 2011. Rohit Sharma did it with MI in 2019 and 2020. Iyer, however, could become the first captain to do it with two different teams.Iyer took KKR to the title last year. Can he do the same with PBKS? RCB vs PBKS LIVE: 1 hour till toss time Despite the fear of rain, officially we are just 1 hour away from toss time at the IPL 2025 final. The two teams have met 3 times this season, with PBKS winning once and RCB winning twice. It will be interesting to see what the toss-winning captain decides, given the conditions at play. IPL Final LIVE: RCB vs PBKS H2H RCB and PBKS have faced each other 36 times in IPL history, and guess what? It is exactly even. 18 wins for RCB, 18 wins for PBKS. Today's final will decide who gets the edge in the head-to-head, and what a prize for it as well! RCB vs PBKS LIVE: The Punjab Kings renaissance under Shreyas Iyer Punjab Kings shelled out a whopping Rs 26.75 crore at the mega auction, as Ricky Ponting went all-in to get Shreyas Iyer as his captain. And just like the duo did with Delhi Capitals in 2020, they've now turned PBKS' fortunes upside down and made their way to the final. Topped the table, beat MI in Qualifier 2, and now a chance to avenge RCB in the final. IPL Final LIVE: The rain is back! Oh dear. It is raining again in Ahmedabad. The rain has been on-and-off all afternoon, but with less than 2 hours to go till the start of the match, this is not good news for the fans. In fact, NDTV has learnt that the closing ceremony has been DELAYED due to the late burst of rain.Originally scheduled to start at 6 PM, the closing ceremony will now begin at 6:15 PM. RCB vs PBKS LIVE: The 18-year wait for Virat Kohli Virat Kohli joined RCB in the very first year of the IPL, 2008. 18 years later, Kohli is 36, but the IPL title has still eluded him. 2025 has been another stellar year with the bat for Kohli, with him scoring over 600 runs. But will he finally get his hands on the golden IPL trophy?Will No. 18 win IPL in its 18th season? It would be a fairytale script if it happens. IPL 2025 Final LIVE: The big wait Both sides have waited 18 years for the IPL title. RCB have reached three finals, won zero. Their last shot at the title came back in 2016, when they agonisingly lost the final at home. PBKS last reached the final in 2014, but lost narrowly too! Today will be the day one of the teams finally fulfil their dream. RCB vs PBKS LIVE: How is the weather? The big concern in the minds of fans will be the weather at the Narendra Modi Stadium in Ahmedabad. Qualifier 2, held at the same stadium just two days ago, was delayed by over 2 hours due to rain. Rain is also on the forecast today.But for now, NDTV has learnt there is NO rain in Ahmedabad. However, the covers have still been kept on the ground. IPL 2025 Final LIVE: RCB vs PBKS In what is the first year after a mega auction, RCB and PBKS have emerged as the two strongest teams in the tournament. They finished in the top two, and have made their way to final after the knockouts. One of these storied sides will win the IPL title for the first time ever. RCB vs PBKS LIVE: IPL 2025 FINAL! Hello and welcome to NDTV Sports, for one final time in IPL 2025. The big day is finally here, as two teams fight out for the big crown. And it is set to be a special day for the winning side, as they'll clinch their first-ever IPL trophy. It's Royal Challengers Bengaluru against Punjab Kings!
html:
RCB vs PBKS LIVE: Thank you!

IPL 2025 comes to an end. The festival will come again next year. That's a wrap for our coverage. 74 matches, a week's break in between, and at the end, history made by RCB. Thank you for joining us along the way on NDTV Sports.

Stay tuned, as we bring you live coverage of the French Open, the Club World Cup, and very soon, India's tour of England!

Thank you! Goodnight.

RCB vs PBKS LIVE: RCB LIFT IPL 2025 TROPHY!

The trophy lift, for Royal Challengers Bengaluru, at long last! Patidar lofts the golden cup high. Virat Kohli is right beside him. Moments of joy and ecstasy for RCB. IPL 2025, historic! This year, they've finally done it!

Cup pic.twitter.com/bBwpZvLD9g

— Royal Challengers Bengaluru (@RCBTweets) June 3, 2025

RCB vs PBKS LIVE: Here comes RCB to collect the prize!

Rajat Patidar steps forward to accept the winning cheque - Rs 20 crore. What a season for RCB, what a moment for Patidar, to win it in his first season as captain. When the mega auction got over, no one would've imagined he'd be the one lifting the cup.

RCB vs PBKS LIVE: Punjab Kings collect runners-up medals

End of a brilliant season for Punjab Kings. Sure, it may be heartbreak for now. But in Shreyas Iyer as captain, Ricky Ponting as coach, and a superb core of young Indian talent, they have plenty to be excited for in seasons to come.

RCB vs PBKS LIVE: IPL 2025 Awards List

Orange Cap: B Sai Sudharsan
Purple Cap: Prasidh Krishna

Emerging Player: B Sai Sudharsan
Super Striker: Vaibhav Suryavanshi

Catch of the Season: Kamindu Mendis
Fairplay Award: Chennai Super Kings
Most Valuable Player: Suryakumar Yadav

RCB vs PBKS LIVE: Krunal Pandya wins POTM

Krunal Pandya is awarded the 'Player of the Match' award. A superb spell of 2/17 in 4 overs. Excellent spell from the experienced all-rounder on the day it matters the most. Huge performance by him.

IPL Final LIVE: The presentation starts!

The post-match presentation ceremony has started. In a matter of moments, we will see RCB captain Rajat Patidar speak. We will also see the RCB team burst into celebration with the cup!

RCB vs PBKS LIVE: Kohli, Gayle, ABD say 'Ee Saala Cup Namdu'

This is gold. Virat Kohli is being interviewed alongside AB de Villiers and Chris Gayle. Kohli points out that the phrase is now 'Ee Saala Cup Namdu'. Hugs and laughter among the holy trinity of RCB. Incredible scenes.

RCB vs PBKS LIVE: A long way to go for PBKS

Punjab Kings have plenty to be proud of. A team that fields as many as six uncapped Indians in their playing XI. Don't be surprised if at least half of them are capped by the time IPL 2026 comes around. Priyansh Arya, Prabhsimran Singh, Nehal Wadhera, Vijaykumar Vyshak, Harpreet Brar. A team full of bubbling Indian talent!

They'll have a lot more to achieve.

RCB vs PBKS LIVE: Captain Rajat Patidar!

Not only Virat Kohli, but Rajat Patidar also etches his name into RCB folklore. The shock captaincy choice ahead of the season, he'll be the first captain for this historic franchise to lift the cup. A massive achievement for Patidar.

RCB vs PBKS LIVE: Long embrace between Virat and Anushka

Virat Kohli and wife Anushka Sharma share a long, warm embrace. Emotional moments for him. The players are circling the trophy now. They've earned this moment. A gruelling season of IPL, but after 7/7 away wins, they won Q1 and won the Final.

RCB vs PBKS LIVE: EE SAALA CUP NAMDU!

One year after the women did it, the men have done it too. Royal Challengers Bengaluru, arguably the most popular franchise, can finally go back and look at the IPL trophy in their cabinet. A long, long wait, but now, an emotional release. 

'Ee Saala Cup Namde' finally becomes 'Ee Saala Cup Namdu'.

RCB vs PBKS LIVE: It's right up there, says Kohli

Virat Kohli has won a World Cup, two Champions Trophies, one T20 World Cup, been the Player of the Tournament at a World Cup, won the IPL Orange Cap twice. But even he says that this trophy ranks right up there.
"It feels more special to do this with RCB, after 18 years. I'll stay with this franchise till the last day I play in the IPL."

RCB vs PBKS LIVE: KOHLI'S FIRST REACTION!

Virat Kohli, full of emotion, having cried his heart out with joy, speaks on RCB's title win: "I tried to win this every season, come and give everything I have. I never thought this day would come. I was overcome with emotion to finally win the IPL!"

IPL 2025 Final LIVE: Kudos to RCB management

Andy Flower, Dinesh Karthik, Mo Bobat. The men who sat at the auction table and picked this core of players at the IPL 2025 mega auction. And they can look back and feel proud of it. 

RCB vs PBKS LIVE: ABD, Gayle celebrate

AB de Villiers was earlier on the pitch capturing the moment. Now Chris Gayle is there too. Two of RCB's greatest players who never got to taste IPL success. But they're here to celebrate now. Fourth time lucky for RCB!

RCB vs PBKS LIVE: Take a bow, Krunal Pandya

A fourth IPL title for Krunal Pandya. 2017, 2019, 2020 with MI. 2025 with RCB. And what a role he played. 17 wickets in 15 matches, a match-winning knock with the bat too. Probably the best all-rounder of IPL 2025 too.

RCB vs PBKS LIVE: Commiserations Punjab Kings

Punjab Kings would've fancied themselves to chase 191 down, but some excellent middle overs, led by Krunal Pandya's miserly spell, made the difference. You have to feel for PBKS, so close, yet so far in the end. 

Second IPL final in 18 years, but it ends in defeat too. A terrific season, they topped the table, but just couldn't get over the line.

RCB vs PBKS LIVE: Virat Kohli's crowning moment

Finally. Virat Kohli wins the IPL title. 18 years with one franchise, two Orange Caps, but look at the emotions on his face. In tears, in ecstasy. RCB have finally done it, and AB de Villiers is on the ground to capture the raw emotions. 

RCB vs PBKS LIVE: RCB WIN IPL 2025!

Royal Challengers Bengaluru are IPL 2025 CHAMPIONS! Shashank Singh slams the last ball for 6 but it will not matter! Virat Kohli is in tears, Swastik Chikara is there to embrace him. RCB captain Rajat Patidar has run away in celebration. The team are cheering in joy. The 18-year wait ends at long last!

RCB 190/8 (20) beat PBKS 184/7 (20) by 6 runs!

RCB vs PBKS LIVE: SIX, FOUR, SIX Shashank

Three big hits from Shashank Singh, but these boundaries won't make an impact. First a shot over deep square-leg, then a boundary over the keeper's head. The third one is smashed over mid-wicket. You have to feel for PBKS as well, they'll lose their second IPL final.

PBKS 178/7 (19.5)

RCB vs PBKS LIVE: RCB seal it?

Two dots in a row! Punjab Kings now need 29 runs in 4 balls. It is mathematically impossible for them, if RCB bowl 4 legal balls. Virat Kohli looks filled with emotion, on the verge of tears. A crowd full of RCB fans are cheering.

PBKS 162/7 (19.2)

IPL 2025 Final LIVE: PBKS need 29 off 6

One 6, one 4, but this won't bother RCB. Punjab Kings need 29 runs off the final over. Shashank Singh on strike, Hazlewood to bowl.

PBKS 162/7 (19)

RCB vs PBKS LIVE: PBKS need 41 off 12

Excellent over by Yash Dayal. Just 6 runs off the 18th over. Shashank and Jamieson need to score more than 20 runs per over for the final two. A mountain to climb.

PBKS 149/7 (18)

RCB vs PBKS LIVE: OUT!

GONE! Omarzai departs, Punjab Kings are 7-down now! Yash Dayal takes the wicket with his second ball. Omarzai goes for a big slog, catches the ball on the toe end of the bat and it is caught by sub fielder Manoj Bhandage.

PBKS 145/7 (17.2)

IPL Final LIVE: PBKS need 47 off 18 vs RCB

3 overs to go. 47 runs needed. 16 runs per over. Shashank Singh and Azmatullah Omarzai at the crease. These are two players who can still strike a long ball. Punjab Kings aren't out of it just yet, but RCB can dream.

PBKS 144/6 (17)

RCB vs PBKS LIVE: OUT!

Massive wicket! Marcus Stoinis is gone! The Australian departs second-ball. Huge, huge, huge wicket. Is that Punjab Kings' last hope gone? RCB can feel it, RCB can dare to dream about the first IPL title. Bhuvi has delivered two wickets in one over. Stoinis swings, thick outside edge flies to Yash Dayal at short third.

PBKS 142/6 (16.4)

RCB vs PBKS LIVE: Stoinis starts with 6!

BANG! Marcus Stoinis comes to the crease and deposits the first ball he faces over covers for a maximum. This game is far from over, and Stoinis has sent the warning to RCB! He needs to stay till the end for PBKS to win.

PBKS 142/5 (16.3)

RCB vs PBKS LIVE: OUT!

Bhuvneshwar gets Wadhera! Big wicket for RCB, another dismissal. Good wide yorker by Bhuvneshwar Kumar, Wadhera goes for the big shot but ends up slicing it to Krunal Pandya at deep extra cover.

PBKS 136/5 (16.2)

RCB vs PBKS LIVE: RCB waste DRS review

Another poor DRS review by RCB, after an appeal for LBW against Shashank. Clearly missing the stumps. They have no more reviews left. Meanwhile, Shashank ends the Hazlewood over with another six! Smashed over long-on. 17 off the over. PBKS need 55 off the last 4!

PBKS 136/4 (16)

RCB vs PBKS LIVE: SIX!

Short ball, whacked for a maximum! Slower ball by Hazlewood, helped away for a maximum by Shashank Singh. Excellent shot. 8 runs in the first 3 balls of the over. PBKS staying alive in this run chase.

PBKS 127/4 (15.3)

RCB vs PBKS LIVE: 13 off the over

Still not what they need! A boundary, a six but the required rate keeps climbing. 13 runs in the over, they need over 14! Good comeback by Shepherd, concedes just 2 runs in the final 3 deliveries of the over. PBKS need 72 in 5 overs.

PBKS 119/4 (15)

RCB vs PBKS LIVE: SIX!

Wadhera! Sweet sound off the bat! That is a cracking shot from the young left-hander. Smashed over mid-wicket, all the way for 6. Two uncapped Indian batters at the crease, and is this the over that the comeback begins?

PBKS 118/4 (14.4)

IPL 2025 Final LIVE: FOUR!

Romario Shepherd back, and Shashank slams it down the ground for 4. First boundary in more than 12 overs. Meanwhile, RCB have been given their second warning for not starting an over in 60 seconds. One more warning, and they'll be handed a 5-run penalty!

PBKS 111/4 (14.2)

RCB vs PBKS LIVE: Good over by Suyash

Just 5 runs off the 14th over. Wadhera and Shashank really struggling. Both going at a strike rate of 50. Shashank 3 off 6, Wadhera 6 off 12. Punjab Kings need 85 runs in the final 6 overs. Required run rate over 14!

PBKS 106/4 (14)

RCB vs PBKS LIVE: Title-winning spell by Krunal Pandya?

4 overs, 2/17. Scintillating spell by Krunal Pandya in the IPL final. Possibly the spell that could win RCB their long-awaited trophy. Bringing all his experience into the game, and putting on a superb showing. Superb stuff.

PBKS need 90 runs in 42 balls. Required rate: 12.86

PBKS 101/4 (13)

RCB vs PBKS LIVE: HUGE WICKET!

Josh Inglis departs! The set batter is gone! Krunal Pandya gets his second wicket, there's pandemonium among the RCB team. Josh Inglis is caught at long-on, he departs for 39 off 23 balls. 93 runs needed off 47 balls now.

PBKS 98/4 (12.1)

RCB vs PBKS LIVE: SIX, Inglis!

Josh Inglis is keeping Punjab Kings in this run chase! Short ball by Shepherd and a fabulous shot by Inglis over mid-wicket. 10 runs come off Shepherd's second over. Punjab Kings still need to score at over 11 runs per over.

PBKS 98/3 (12)

RCB vs PBKS LIVE: Another top over by Krunal

Krunal Pandya is a man on a mission today. Excellent over by Krunal, who is going at less than 5 runs an over in the IPL final. After conceding a six on the first ball, he comes back by bowling 4 dots in the next 5 balls.

PBKS 88/3 (11)

RCB vs PBKS LIVE: SIX!

Josh Inglis continues the merry! He hits spin so well. The Australian will need to play a big knock today if RCB are to win today. Once again, smashes a maximum over mid-wicket. Into the 30s now.

PBKS 87/3 (10.2)

RCB vs PBKS LIVE: PBKS need 110 in 10 overs

11 runs per over. That's the equation for Punjab Kings to win the IPL 2025 final. Humongous wicket of Shreyas Iyer, who has been silenced in the final. Romario Shepherd with the huge wicket. Onus now on Inglis and Wadhera.

PBKS 81/3 (10)

(Live Scorecard)

RCB vs PBKS LIVE: HUGE WICKET! IYER DEPARTS!

SHREYAS IYER IS GONE! Caught behind! Romario Shepherd takes the wicket, Jitesh Sharma with the catch. RCB players celebrating, Virat Kohli is charged up and the first one to high-five Shepherd. Huge, huge wicket.

PBKS 79/3 (9.4)

RCB vs PBKS LIVE: FOUR!

Slammed! Through mid-wicket, one bounce for 4. Romario Shepherd into the attack, bowls a cutter, but helped through to the fence by Inglis. The Australian continues to look in good touch today.

Virat Kohli joined RCB in the very first year of the IPL, 2008. 18 years later, Kohli is 36, but the IPL title has still eluded him. 2025 has been another stellar year with the bat for Kohli, with him scoring over 600 runs. But will he finally get his hands on the golden IPL trophy?

Will No. 18 win IPL in its 18th season? It would be a fairytale script if it happens.

IPL 2025 Final LIVE: The big wait

Both sides have waited 18 years for the IPL title. RCB have reached three finals, won zero. Their last shot at the title came back in 2016, when they agonisingly lost the final at home. PBKS last reached the final in 2014, but lost narrowly too! Today will be the day one of the teams finally fulfil their dream.

RCB vs PBKS LIVE: How is the weather?

The big concern in the minds of fans will be the weather at the Narendra Modi Stadium in Ahmedabad. Qualifier 2, held at the same stadium just two days ago, was delayed by over 2 hours due to rain. Rain is also on the forecast today.
But for now, NDTV has learnt there is NO rain in Ahmedabad. However, the covers have still been kept on the ground.
